full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RNGA MONG GA-YANG 'GUGS DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES RNGA MONG GA-YANG 'GUGS DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DA LTA SNYIGS MA'I DUS SU RNAM PAR DKAR PA'I BSOD NAMS BSAGS PA'I GANG ZAG NYIN GYI SKAR MA BZHIN 'GA' ZHIG YOD @008B KYANG, RKANG BZHI PHYUGS KYI LONGS SPYOD MED NA STONG STONG PO MED MED PO LTAR ZHES PA'I DBANG GIS, RKYEN MA BYAS KYANG MANG POS, NOR LHA RNAMS LAS GANG 'DOD PA'I ZHU BA GA-YANG 'GUGS KYI RIM PA DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYI MDZAD PA MANG DU YOD KYANG, RNGA MONG GA-YANG SKYABS BLA MA RNAL 'BYOR PA ZHES BYA BA'I MDZAD PA'I SOG SKAD KYIS MDOR BSDUS ZHIG LAS GZHAN MED PAS, BLA MA DE NI GRUB PA THOB PA ZHIG YIN PAS SNGON NAS SHIS PA 'BYUNG BA'I GSUNG YIN PAS, DE LA THAB LHA BSKYED PA DANG BSANGS MCHOD PA GA-YANG 'GUGS SOGS KYIS KHA BSKANGS TE, THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I DNGOS GRUB 'DOD PA CAN RNAMS LA DGOS PA MED NA'ANG, 'JIG RTEN PA'I DNGOS GRUB 'DOD PA BDAG 'DRA BA RES 'GA' YOD NA PHAN SRID SNYAMS STE BSAM PA DKAR BAS BSKUL TE, DGE SLONG GI GZUGS 'DZIN PA AARTHA SIDDHI'I MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS SU SBYAR BA DGE LEGS 'PHEL NAS BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O, ,)
